tasks.task: Using Quick Lock fittings for irrigation systems
subtasks: Identify the diameter of the tubing (e.g., 3 inch)
Remove the nut to access the barb
Note the counterintuitive direction of the nut (turns opposite of expectations)
Align the tube onto the barb while wiggling it back and forth
Disassemble the fitting by reversing the above steps
Remember that Quick Lock fittings are for drip systems only
Chat with customer service agents on their website
Subscribe to the YouTube channel for more information

tasks.task: Using Quick Lock fittings for irrigation systems**
